channel.title: Watch List on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Watch List on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: A Misconfiguration That Haunts Corporate Streaming Platforms Could Expose Sensitive Data
item.description: A security researcher discovered that flawed API configurations are plaguing corporate livestreaming platforms, potentially exposing internal company meetings—and he’s releasing a tool to find them.
